original_text: so that all the craftsmen who were doing every sort of task on the sanctuary came, each from the task that he was doing,
korean_text: 성소의 모든 일을 하는 지혜로운 자들이 각기 하는 일을 중지하고 와서

sentences.original_text: who were doing every sort of task on the sanctuary
each from the task that he was doing
